H3.text: what form of government does canada. Federation

A4.text: Under Canada's Westminster-style parliamentary democracy, the terms government and Government of Canada refer specifically to the prime minister, Cabinet, and other members of the governing party inside the House of Commons

A5.text: Canada is a constitutional monarchy, wherein the role of the reigning sovereign is both legal and practical, but not political

A6.text: This system is used in: Australia, Canada, India, Jamaica, Malaysia, New Zealand, United Kingdom, Portugal, Czech Republic

A7.text: The head of state appoints a prime minister who will likely have majority support in parliament
